item.title: 1.6.87-alpha
item.description: CHANGES FROM v1.5: * Add export order only option * Add image preview * Update checking (auto and manual update check) * Auto update installation * Incase steam game is being launched and steam is not running launch steam before starting the game * Add resume saved game option * Fix threading issue where Irony did not properly mark a patch collection as valid but instead as invalid * Add ignore file syntax to ignore rules * Add tooltip indicator showing where the file is from in mod compare selector (conflict solver) * Add context menu options in mod compare selector to open definition files\directories (conflict solver) * Fix actual conflict solver notification not showing * Add context menu option to paste mod name order * Add option to change game data directory * Small bugfixes\improvements I've forgot to mention
